title: Ticket Reservation Information
cancelPolicyText:
The cancellation and refund policy for this hot spring ticket reservation is as follows:

- Cancellations up to 3 days (72 hours) before the date of use: 100% full refund
- Cancellations between 24 hours to 3 days before the date of use: 50% refund
- Cancellations within 24 hours of the date of use or no-show: No refund (0%)

※ Cancellations must be made through the cancellation request feature on this site, and the refund policy is applied based on the time of request.
※ Refund fees may be deducted depending on the payment agency’s policy.
※ Refunds may take approximately 3–10 business days depending on the payment method.
※ Some discounted or special-priced products may have separate non-refundable policies.
※ In case of force majeure (e.g., natural disasters, government restrictions), different policies may apply.

I have read and agree to the above cancellation and refund policy.
privacyPolicyTitle: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information
privacyPolicyText:
I consent to the collection and use of personal information for using the hot spring ticket reservation service.

1. Collected Items
- Name (First, Last)
- Contact Info (Phone, Email)
- Nationality
- Reservation Info (Lodge name, ticket type, number of guests, date of use)
- Special Requests

2. Purpose of Collection and Use
- Reservation processing and management
- Reservation confirmation, changes, cancellations, refunds, etc.
- Payment processing and settlement
- Legal obligations and dispute resolution
- Service quality improvement and customer support

3. Retention Period
- Retained for 5 years after reservation completion for follow-up
- Retained as required by law (e.g., e-commerce consumer protection law)

4. Third-Party Sharing and Delegation
- Personal data may be processed by third-party services such as payment processors, reservation systems, and customer support within the necessary scope.

I have read and agree to the above.
